children.description: The inputs to the operation - if any.

name.description: This is only applicable to column ops.
name.title: Specifies the name of a column.

value.description: This is only applicable to literal ops.
value.title: Specifies the value of a literal.

valueType.description: This is only applicate to column and literal ops.
valueType.title: Specifies the value type of a column or a literal op.
